name: 地城蔷薇
description:
"Dungeon Rose" is a real-time chess game that is lightly developed and highly competitive. Players in each round need to work with 50 other players to survive on the same map at the same time, the game is more difficult. Improve your character's combat effectiveness by earning silver and gold rewards in battle.
Here are some basic survival guidelines:

(1) The assassin's difficulty is relatively low, suitable for novices, and the wizard is relatively difficult.
(2) Try not to fight with people at the beginning, grab the monsters, search for experience balls and equipment, and develop as soon as possible.
(3) Equipment quality White <Blue <Gold, double-click the equipment in the treasure chest to pick it up.
(4) Find the key before the countdown in the upper right corner, and you can enter the next level with the key.
(5) The key killed by the player will be taken away by the opponent, of course, you can also use this method to grab others.
(6) At level 1, priority is given to attacking mobs at level 1 (except for lava spiders). Mobs at level 3 do not lose a second, while lava spiders at level 1 can spike, (but experience is not enough to immediately rise to level 2.
(7) Be careful when you have blood, those insignificant villains will definitely kill you first ...
(8) Wooden organs can push you far, can be used to hurry, and sometimes can save your life.
(9) Try to use the time to read the note to open the box and adjust the equipment.
(10) Common skills can be considered to unlock evolution, the effect is significant ~
(11) If you do not know the equipment skills at the beginning, you can study it in the introduction interface outside the battle.
12) Join the game official communication group: 831914042, there are many big brothers and young ladies ~
